title: Bug 122105 - Schema not added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using stored procedure
description: The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
OB: In the window 'Edit data set', when dragging a stored procedure to the QueryText, the observed behavior is that the stored procedure naming does not include the database schema name.
EB: The expected behavior is that the stored procedure naming should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the 'Edit data set' window.
2. Drag a stored procedure to the QueryText.
3. Observe that the stored procedure naming does not include the database schema name.
